title: Piyush Panigrahi
text:
I am an Economist in the Economics and Market Research Department at the International Finance Corporation and a Research Affiliate of the CESifo Network. I received my Ph.D.Â in Economics from University of California, Berkeley in May 2021. I can be reached at piyushp@berkeley.edu or ppanigrahi@worldbank.org.
